voca.pattern: How long will it be till ~ ?
voca.means_en: A : How long will it be till they get here?\n

voca.means_ko: ~ 하는지 몰라서요.\n~ 한지 궁금해서요.\n~ 하는지 해서요.
voca.means_en:
I was wondering if you have a spare minute tonight.
I was wondering if you delivered?
I was wondering if you'd like to have coffee sometime.
I was wondering if you could help me.
I was wondering if I could have a break.

voca.pattern: It should be no longer than
voca.means_en: B : It should be no longer than 30 minutes.\n

voca.means_ko: ~ 을 참을 수 없다. (견딜 수 없다)
voca.means_en:
I can't stand that smell.
I can't stand the pain and dentists are expensive.
I can't stand living here! I'm moving out!

voca.pattern: I'm in the middle of + G
voca.means_en: I'm in the middle of studying for my final exams.\n

I’m looking for a smartphone with the latest features.
I'm looking for a job.
I'm looking for books by James Bond.
I'm looking for a cookbook.
Where can I find a cosmetics section?\nSophie: Excuse me. Where can I find the best-sellers' section?\n
